backend/main.mo: Main backend canister defining user profiles, game logic, transactions, access control, Stripe config, and admin update functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping product features to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for many frontend source files and components.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme variables and dark mode styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router configuration with authenticated layout, routes, admin guards, and global providers.
frontend/src/components/admin/PaymentSet: Empty placeholder component file for admin payment setup.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: Route guard that checks admin status and redirects unauthorized users, with loading skeletons.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for first‑time profile setup with form validation, referral handling, and welcome bonus flow.
frontend/src/components/common/PageHeade: Renders a page header with title, optional description, badge, and action elements.
frontend/src/components/common/PremiumSp: Displays a customizable premium spinner with layered animated visuals.
frontend/src/components/game/SpinWheel.t: Implements a visual spin wheel using canvas rendering, animations, and outcome-based celebration handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Provides the main application layout with navigation, user data integration, mobile menu, and animated background.
frontend/src/components/wallet/BalanceTi: Animates balance changes by smoothly incrementing displayed credits.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated backend actor, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for user profile, admin checks, wheel spins, leaderboard, and configuration retrieval.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, custom OKLCH color variables, utility classes, gradients, shadows, and animations for premium-themed UI styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider, rendering the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Provides navigation cards for admins to manage users, wheel config, withdrawals, and payment requests.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminManualPaym: Allows admins to view, approve, or decline manual payment requests and edit payment configuration.
Lists all users with balances and lets admins update user credit amounts.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminWheelConfi: Admin page to view and update the house edge, including validation and form submission with loading states.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminWithdrawal: Admin UI placeholder for withdrawal request management showing pending feature notice and empty state.
frontend/src/pages/BuyCreditsPage.tsx: Provides UI and logic for purchasing credits via packages, quick offers, or custom amounts, including QR dialog handling and payment request creation.
frontend/src/pages/GamePage.tsx: Implements the spin‑wheel game UI, handling spin requests, outcomes, balance updates, and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Renders a styled login screen that authenticates users via Internet Identity with premium visual effects.
frontend/src/pages/payments/PaymentFailu: Displays a failure message when no payment request was created, with options to retry or return home.
frontend/src/pages/payments/PaymentSucce: Handles manual payment request status display with auto‑refresh logic and conditional UI for different states.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Displays the user's profile, balance, transactions, and identity details with loading states and copy‑to‑clipboard support.
frontend/src/pages/TransactionsPage.tsx: Displays a full transaction history fetched from the user profile with loading states and icons for different transaction types.
frontend/src/pages/UnauthorizedPage.tsx: Shows an access-denied message with a button to return to the home page.
frontend/src/pages/WalletPage.tsx: Shows the user's credit balance, actions to buy or withdraw credits, and a small list of recent transactions.
frontend/src/pages/WithdrawPage.tsx: Presents withdrawal information and notes that withdrawals are not yet available.
frontend/src/utils/creditPricing.ts: Helpers to derive credits‑per‑INR ratios from packages and compute or validate credit pricing.
frontend/src/utils/currency.ts: Utility functions for INR formatting and converting between rupees and paise.
frontend/src/utils/razorpay.ts: Empty placeholder module for Razorpay-related utilities.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters, supporting query and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing UI redesign goals, performance issues, and feature request tracking.
